Description: Arabic inscription in centre within two plain circles, circular legend, all within a plain circle. (obverse)
Arabic inscription in centre within two plain circles, circular legend, all within a plain circle. (reverse)
Bibliographic references: BMC Oriental 4 / The coinage of Egypt under the Fatimee Khaleefehs, the Ayyoobees and the Memlook Sultans, classes XIVa, XV, XVI (115, p.29)
